author: stsp
msg: Add an XFail test for "svn resolve --accept=theirs-conflict" which is
failing if the resolve target is not in the current working directory.
svn: warning: Can't open file 'alpha.r1': No such file or directory
(test_list): Add new test and mark it XFAIL.

author: rhuijben
msg: Following up on r37880 and to fix issue #3523, make sure the current path used for
trimming notifications is properly encoded and canonicalized.
apr_filepath_get() returns paths in a platform dependant format which
happens to be utf-8 on MacOS and Windows, but is locale dependant on other
systems. Instead of fixing the encoding and then canonicalizing I use the
shortcut of making the "" path absolute with the dirent api.
(svn_cl__get_notifier): Use svn_dirent_get_absolute() to retrieve the current

author: philip
msg: Followup to r40385.  SVNMasterURI also needs mod_proxy_http and generates
cryptic 500 Internal Server Error messages if it is not present.

author: gstein
msg: Announce our entry into the Apache Incubator.
* www/index.html: add short announcement at top of page

author: julianfoad
msg: Initialize an array with character constants rather than a string constant,
to avoid a compiler warning about not having room for a terminating null
character is a version number and not a string terminator.
